msg: Introduce opening a file inheritable on Win32, and some general text cleanup.

author: wrowe
msg: In order to use this IMPLEMENT_SET/UNSET schema, this has got to be a
bit flag... the apr_file_t already has too many int flags hiding in it,
and ->flags is already a member of the apr_file_t.

author: rbb
msg: We need to use the correct flag in apr_accept.  Apr_accept doesn't get the
inherit flag passed in, so we need to find it in the structure.
